content: flawless socks is as easy as it gets worked toe-up with gusset and slipped stitch heel this garter ribbed socks are sure to be one of your favorite for your feet instructions are written for magic loop method **sizes** s m l to fit a foot circunference of 16 18 20 cm 6 1⁄4 7 1⁄8 8 inches approx picture features size s **materials** wool light fingering weight yarn picture features i knit london flawless in colorway feed your head needles 2 50 mm circular needle with cable long enough for magic loop method or size needed to obtain gauge other notions tapestry needles scissors **gauge** 9st x 12 row in 2 5 cm 1 inch in stockinette stitch
